items.value: A raid party from (%@value%) is on its way to steal gold from (%@value%).
A citizen of (%@value%) has discovered the presence of the raid party. The raid party was able to fool the citizen that they came from (%@value%).
The raid party successfully stole (%value%) Gold.
The raid party left with nothing.
A citizen of (%@value%) has discovered the presence of the raid party.
